alert.note: Alert for Benton; Washington (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 05 at 12:58AM CDT until May 05 at 1:45AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tulsa has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Benton County in northwestern Arkansas... Northwestern Washington County in northwestern Arkansas... Adair County in northeastern Oklahoma... Southeastern Cherokee County in east central Oklahoma... * Until 145 AM CDT. * At 1258 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 3 miles northwest of Bunch, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations in or near the path include... Siloam Springs... Stilwell... Farmington... Lincoln... Westville... West Siloam Springs... Watts... Adair State Park... Christie... Cincinnati... Maryetta... Cookson... Bunch... Baron... Lake Francis... Savoy... Ballard... Wedington... Gallitin... Rhea... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 400 AM CDT for northeastern and east central Oklahoma. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
